typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Region as string,
		Country as string,
		{Item Type} as string,
		{Sales Channel} as string,
		{Order Priority} as integer,
		{Order Date} as date 'yyyy-MM-dd',
		{Order ID} as integer,
		{Ship Date} as date 'yyyy-MM-dd',
		{Units Sold} as integer,
		{Unit Price} as integer,
		{Unit Cost} as double,
		{Total Revenue} as double,
		{Total Cost} as double,
		{Total Profit} as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	moveFiles: ['','Archive']) ~> salesdatacuration
salesdatacuration sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Column_10 as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Column_12 as string,
		Column_13 as string,
		Column_14 as string
	),
	truncate: true) ~> curateddata
